alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:33PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...CUSTER... LAWRENCE...SOUTHWESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...EASTERN FALL RIVER... SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON...NORTHERN CAMPBELL...NORTHERN WESTON AND CROOK COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM MDT... At 732 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Spotted Horse to 2 miles north of Redbank Spring Campground to near Chadron Campground. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hot Springs and Cold Brook Reservoir around 735 PM MDT. Custer and Crazy Horse Memorial around 740 PM MDT. Sundance, Devils Tower Junction, Sylvan Lake, and Blue Bell around 750 PM MDT. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 18. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 119 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
